page.title: 16CLUBS+AMENITIES/OVERTON
page.content: There is a long-established Horticultural Society,which runs two shows annually,and a bowling club at the Ship Hotel has been re-formed. Greendales Country Club in Middleton owned by Â£BullseyeÂ£sÂ£Jim Bowen,has dancing and cabaret.The Parish Hall in Middleton has a well-subscribed licenced club.The locals traditionally enjoy country pursuits,like shooting and fishing.There is a flourishing Gun Club,for pistol and clay-pigeon shooting,which meets weekly on spare ground owned by I.C.I.
